EndReason.description:
挂断原因，有以下枚举：
     1.正常完结
     2.拒识后机器人挂机
     3.静默超时挂机
     4.拒识后用户挂机
     5.用户无理由挂机
     6.命中意图转人工
     7.拒识转人工
     8.用户侧无交互
     9.系统异常中断
     10.命中意图转IVR
     11.拒识转IVR

DescribeNavigationConfig.responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "14C39896-AE6D-4643-9C9A-E0566B2C2DDD",
  "GreetingConfig": {
    "SourceType": "chatbotIntent",
    "IntentTrigger": "你好",
    "GreetingWords": "您好，欢迎致电智能导航"
  },
  "UnrecognizingConfig": {
    "FinalAction": "TransferToAgent",
    "FinalActionParams": "{ \\\"skillGroupId\\\": \\\"fallbackSkillGroup\\\" }",
    "Threshold": 3,
    "Prompt": "抱歉，我无法理解您的意思",
    "FinalPrompt": "抱歉，我暂时无法处理您的问题，即将为您转接人工"
  },
  "RepeatingConfig": {
    "Utterances": [
      " [         \"没听清\",         \"再说一遍\"       ]"
    ]
  },
  "AskingBackConfig": {
    "NegativeFeedbackPrompt": "感谢您的来电。请您稍后为我的服务做出评价。",
    "NegativeFeedbackAction": "TransferToIVR",
    "NegativeFeedbackActionParams": "{ \\\"route\\\": \\\"satisfaction\\\" }",
    "EnableNegativeFeedback": true,
    "Enabled": true,
    "Prompt": "请问还有什么可以帮您？",
    "NegativeFeedbackUtterances": [
      " [         \"没有了\",         \"不需要了\",         \"不用了，谢谢\"       ],"
    ]
  },
  "ComplainingConfig": {
    "FinalAction": "TransferToAgent",
    "Prompt": "好的，即将为您转接人工处理",
    "FinalActionParams": "{ \\\"skillGroupId\\\": \\\"fallbackSkillGroup\\\" }",
    "Utterances": [
      "[         \"投诉\",         \"转人工\",         \"有没有人工\"       ]"
    ]
  },
  "SilenceTimeoutConfig": {
    "Timeout": 10,
    "IntentTrigger": "\"\"",
    "FinalPrompt": "抱歉，听不到您说话，请您稍后致电",
    "SourceType": "chatbotIntent",
    "FinalAction": "HangUp",
    "Prompt": "抱歉，我没听到您说话",
    "Threshold": 3,
    "FinalActionParams": "{}"
  }
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<RequestId>14C39896-AE6D-4643-9C9A-E0566B2C2DDD</RequestId>
<GreetingConfig>
    <GreetingWords>您好，欢迎致电智能导航</GreetingWords>
</GreetingConfig>
<UnrecognizingConfig>
    <Prompt>抱歉，我无法理解您的意思</Prompt>
    <Threshold>3</Threshold>
    <FinalPrompt>抱歉，我暂时无法处理您的问题，即将为您转接人工</FinalPrompt>
    <FinalAction>TransferToAgent</FinalAction>
    <FinalActionParams>{ "skillGroupId": "fallbackSkillGroup" }</FinalActionParams>
</UnrecognizingConfig>
<RepeatingConfig>
    <Utterances>没听清</Utterances>
    <Utterances>再说一遍</Utterances>
</RepeatingConfig>
<AskingBackConfig>
    <Enabled>true</Enabled>
    <Prompt>请问还有什么可以帮您？</Prompt>
    <EnableNegativeFeedback>true</EnableNegativeFeedback>
    <NegativeFeedbackUtterances>没有了</NegativeFeedbackUtterances>
    <NegativeFeedbackUtterances>不需要了</NegativeFeedbackUtterances>
    <NegativeFeedbackUtterances>不用了，谢谢</NegativeFeedbackUtterances>
    <NegativeFeedbackPrompt>感谢您的来电。请您稍后为我的服务做出评价。</NegativeFeedbackPrompt>
    <NegativeFeedbackAction>TransferToIVR</NegativeFeedbackAction>
    <NegativeFeedbackActionParams> { "route": "satisfaction" } </NegativeFeedbackActionParams>
</AskingBackConfig>
<SilenceTimeoutConfig>
    <Prompt>抱歉，我没听到您说话</Prompt>
    <Timeout>10</Timeout>
    <Threshold>3</Threshold>
    <FinalPrompt>抱歉，听不到您说话，请您稍后致电</FinalPrompt>
    <FinalAction>HangUp</FinalAction>
</SilenceTimeoutConfig>
<ComplainingConfig>
    <Utterances>投诉</Utterances>
    <Utterances>转人工</Utterances>
    <Utterances>有没有人工</Utterances>
    <Prompt>好的，即将为您转接人工处理</Prompt>
    <Action>TransferToAgent</Action>
    <ActionParams>{ "skillGroupId": "fallbackSkillGroup" }</ActionParams>
</ComplainingConfig>","errorExample":""}]
